snippet: LAWRENCE--Cherry McDonnell, 91, of Bronxville, NY, died peacefully at home on March 3, 2016. Wife of the late Ruddick C. Lawrence, she is survived by her beloved daughters Leslie Tawfik, of New York, NY and Caroline Blydenburgh, of Winter Park, FL, her sons-in-law, Mounir Tawfik and Jeffrey Blydenburgh, her grandchildren Archie and Olivia Blydenburgh, and by her much loved and devoted stepchildren and grandchildren. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Gramatan Village, 85 Pondfield Rd., #
lead_paragraph: LAWRENCE--Cherry McDonnell, 91, of Bronxville, NY, died peacefully at home on March 3, 2016. Wife of the late Ruddick C. Lawrence, she is survived by her beloved daughters Leslie Tawfik, of New York, NY and Caroline Blydenburgh, of Winter Park, FL, her sons-in-law, Mounir Tawfik and Jeffrey Blydenburgh, her grandchildren Archie and Olivia Blydenburgh, and by her much loved and devoted stepchildren and grandchildren. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Gramatan Village, 85 Pondfield Rd., #

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LAWRENCE, CHERRY MCDONNELL
